brand.name: Wolvis
brand.ethicalInfo1: Wolvis is a Belgian brand that offers premium merino wool knitwear and more.
brand.ethicalInfo2:
Wolvis's environment rating is 'not good enough'. It does not use eco-friendly materials. There is no evidence it minimises textile waste. It manufactures locally to reduce its carbon footprint. There is no evidence it implements water reduction initiatives.

Its labour rating is 'not good enough'. Its final stage of production is undertaken in Belgium, a low risk country for labour abuse. There is no evidence it has a Code of Conduct. There is no evidence it ensures payment of a living wage in its supply chain. There is no evidence it audits its supply chain.

Its animal rating is 'it's a start'. It does not use fur, down, exotic animal skin, exotic animal hair or angora. It uses leather and wool.

Wolvis is rated 'Not good enough' overall.
brand.positiveText: Dear Wolvis, I love the style and features of your products, and also that you care about people, the planet and animals. Good On You!
brand.negativeText: Dear Wolvis, I love the style and features of your products, but I'm concerned about the impact of your brand on workers, the environment and animals. Until you do better I'll be looking for alternative brands that meet my needs.
